references.title: Pumpkin Spice Latte
references.body: Fresh pumpkin puree and warming spices.

output.headline: Warm Up With Acme Coffee's Pumpkin Spice Latte
output.body: Sip into sweater weather with our seasonal Pumpkin Spice Latte, crafted with real pumpkin puree, cinnamon, and nutmeg. Drop by Acme Coffee - Downtown this week and pair it with your favorite pastry for the perfect fall treat.

mediaBrief.concept: Steaming latte on reclaimed wood table with cinnamon sticks
